column3: Ɔwo mbaa mu ɔhoɔfɛfo kɛse? Henfa na wo dɔfo etwa noho afa

column2: "Mo dɔfo esian kɔ no ture mu

column3: na mo dɔfo so yɛ medze: Ɔnyɛn no nguankuw wɔ nsukookoo no mu."
wo ho yɛ fɛw dɛ Tirza
column5: Wo ho yɛ hu dɛ dɔm a wɔdze mfrankaa."

column3: Osiandɛ ɔato me mpokyerɛ. Wo tsinhwi nahanaha tse dɛ serekye ahoma."

column2: "Wo se tse dɛ nguamber a Wofi eguaree aba a Hɔn nyinara wɔawowo nta nta
column3: Na hɔn mu biara nndzi awo mba ewu."

column2: "W'asontɔrmu tse dɛ pɔmegranate eduaba fa Wɔ wo nkataenyim no mu."

column4: Na mbaabun a wonnyi anobu wɔwɔ hɔ
column8: ɔda mu fua; Ne na ne ba kor ara nye no; Nyia ɔwoo no no n'adɔnadze nye no. Mbabaa hun no

column5: No ho yɛ hu dɛ dɔm a wɔdze mfrankaa yi?"

column3: Dɛ morokɔhwɛ bɔnsa no mu ndua ebun ebun
column4: Dɛ morokɔhwɛ dɛ wenyindua no abɔ nkukuduuduw
column5: Na dɛ pɔmegranate ekutu no abɔ nhyiren a."

column3: nna me kra dze me esisi Me man mbapɔmba hɔn ntseaseanam mu."

column6: ma yɛnhwɛ wo. Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom bɔhwɛ Sulamnyi no
column7: Dɛ gyama hom rohwɛ Mahanaim asaw yi?"
